CmdLine: apt-get update &&     DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get -yq install     zip &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -L  http://www.e-dir.fr/arfooo_ultimate/arfooo_ultimate.zip > /var/www/html/arfooo_ultimate.zip &&     unzip /var/www/html/arfooo_ultimate.zip -d /var/www/html/ &&     mv /var/www/html/arfooo\ ultimate/* /var/www/html/ &&     rm /var/www/html/arfooo_ultimate.zip &&     rm -rf  /var/www/html/arfooo\ ultimate/* &&     rm -rf  /var/www/html/arfooo\ ultimate/
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine:
echo "Options +FollowSymlinks 
	RewriteEngine On 
	RewriteBase / 
	RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f 
	RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d 
	RewriteRule ^(.+)$ index.php" > /var/www/html/.htaccess
Commands.Name: run
